declarations.comments: Type synonym for callback functions.
declarations.title: Callback

declarations.comments: Renames a file.
declarations.title: rename

declarations.comments: Truncates a file to the specified length.
declarations.title: truncate

declarations.comments: Changes the ownership of a file.
declarations.title: chown

declarations.comments: Changes the permissions of a file.
declarations.title: chmod

declarations.comments:
Gets file or symlink statistics. `lstat` is identical to `stat`, except
that if the `FilePath` is a symbolic link, then the link itself is stat-ed,
not the file that it refers to.
declarations.title: lstat

declarations.comments: Gets file statistics.
declarations.title: stat

declarations.comments: Creates a link to an existing file.
declarations.title: link

declarations.comments: Creates a symlink.
declarations.title: symlink

declarations.comments: Reads the value of a symlink.
declarations.title: readlink

declarations.comments: Find the canonicalized absolute location for a path.
declarations.title: realpath

declarations.comments:
Find the canonicalized absolute location for a path using a cache object
for already resolved paths.
declarations.title: realpath'

declarations.comments: Deletes a file.
declarations.title: unlink

declarations.comments: Deletes a directory.
declarations.title: rmdir

declarations.comments: Deletes a directory with options.
declarations.title: rmdir'

declarations.comments: Deletes a file or directory.
declarations.title: rm

declarations.comments: Deletes a file or directory with options.
declarations.title: rm'

declarations.comments: Makes a new directory.
declarations.title: mkdir

declarations.comments: Makes a new directory with the specified permissions.
declarations.title: mkdir'

declarations.comments: Reads the contents of a directory.
declarations.title: readdir

declarations.comments: Sets the accessed and modified times for the specified file.
declarations.title: utimes

declarations.comments: Reads the entire contents of a file returning the result as a raw buffer.
declarations.title: readFile

declarations.comments: Reads the entire contents of a text file with the specified encoding.
declarations.title: readTextFile

declarations.comments: Writes a buffer to a file.
declarations.title: writeFile

declarations.comments: Writes text to a file using the specified encoding.
declarations.title: writeTextFile

declarations.comments: Appends the contents of a buffer to a file.
declarations.title: appendFile

declarations.comments: Appends text to a file using the specified encoding.
declarations.title: appendTextFile

declarations.comments:
Open a file asynchronously. See the [Node Documentation](https://nodejs.org/api/fs.html#fs_fs_open_path_flags_mode_callback)
for details.
declarations.title: fdOpen

declarations.comments:
Read from a file asynchronously. See the [Node Documentation](https://nodejs.org/api/fs.html#fs_fs_read_fd_buffer_offset_length_position_callback)
for details.
declarations.title: fdRead

declarations.comments:
Convenience function to fill the whole buffer from the current
file position.
declarations.title: fdNext

declarations.comments:
Write to a file asynchronously. See the [Node Documentation](https://nodejs.org/api/fs.html#fs_fs_write_fd_buffer_offset_length_position_callback)
for details.
declarations.title: fdWrite

declarations.comments:
Convenience function to append the whole buffer to the current
file position.
declarations.title: fdAppend

declarations.comments:
Close a file asynchronously. See the [Node Documentation](https://nodejs.org/api/fs.html#fs_fs_close_fd_callback)
for details.
declarations.title: fdClose
